project.title: TheDailyPulse
project.description: TheDailyPulse is a full stack project using react,tailwind,node,mongodb,ecpress. it is a newspaper website where you can see the news and if you login you can also create,update,read and delete the new.

project.title: Cool tools
project.description: This is an E-Commerce site for selling tools . It is a full stack website.if you login you can also create,update,read and delete the Tools.you can aslo buy and edit your curt here
